name: Just Down the Hall
description:
It's following me...

It follows your every move: every step and every jump. With no end in sight, the shadow lingers just steps behind you. 

A short split-screen endless runner made for Coding Blocks Jam 2022 for the theme "It's following me".  Control both the player character and the Shadow! Avoid the obstacles to prevent getting caught while running the shadow into them. 

Instructions:

  • Space (Keyboard) or A (Controller) to jump
  • Hold jump button for higher jump
  • Lead the Shadow into furniture while avoiding the obstacles yourself
  • Survive as long as you can

Credits:

Michael M. - Programming Lead, Game Design, Level Design, UI Design

Cheyenne M. - Art, Programming, Game Design, Sound Design

Alex M. - Game Testing, Special Thanks

Claus Eggers Sørensen - Playfair Font

Notes:

- Subtle flashing of lightning

- Creepy imagery might be frightening for some

- Capture sound may be startling for some! Sound muting options coming soon!

- If you click on the screen on a menu, the buttons will lose focus and the keyboard / controller input will stop working. If you encounter this issue, you can use a mouse to click on the button you wish to select. Fix for this issue coming soon!

- There is a rare chance of being stuck under a chandelier while on a table! We're working to fix this. In the mean time, the shadow will eventually break the table and you will be freed or sometimes you will be able to squeeze by.
